channel.title: Deception source issues
channel.description:
I'm using the Deception source and I assume this issue has come from the source because the client came from a previous project I created. Was wondering if anyone knew how to fix my error.
My error; Logs in like this..
http://prntscr.com/3hrksv
In game user name; http://i.imgur.com/uL3p8gT.png
It's doing this to all usernames in game but I think on another account I had some other bot name lol.

item.title: Deception source issues
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

Not sure what you mean but I have changeappearence.java in my packets folder lul.
I’ll look a bit more tomorrow I really need to find a fix.

Read full topic

item.title: Deception source issues
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Check the appearance packets and values are being sent correctly when logging in.

This usually happens when invalid values are sent, not sure how but.

Could be something else too, but it’s happened to me through appearance.

Read full topic
